name: Hoarder's Cloud
description:
A (not) relaxing experience of taking care of the plants in VR on a rooftop lost in the clouds

Only tested on the oculus rift and oculus quest via link
feel free to leave any gameplay video in the comments
Have fun :)

Credits:

ART:  Carles Domingo
PROGRAMMING: Toni Rebollo, Enrique Molto
MUSIC: Pau Rodriguez
ADDITIONAL HELP: Angel Rebollo

Font used: Grooker by Zafonts
